fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Network.User

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Network.User.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, VisitableItems

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisitableItems, Observer
    The User class basically represents anyone using the myVelib system. Whether he has a Velib card or not is not relevant to being a user. A user is just someone who uses the system. he is characterized by :
    • a name
    • his position (GPS coordinates)
    • a unique ID

    In case a user holds a card, he also has a time-credit balance (expressed in minutes) representing the credit gained by returning bicycles to plus stations. The time credit is used to compute the actual cost of a bike ride.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre Averous, Nicolas Topuz
    See Also:
    GPScoordinates, Card
